comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: So glad you have posted this to Flickr - I have been looking for it here all week, because it is yet another photo which very closely matches a ca.1902 painting by Julian Ashton - In the news currently due to the Historic Houses Trust exhibition "Painting The Rocks' - www.hht.net.au/whats_on/exhibitions/exhibitions/painting_... Apart from the history (this picturesque corner of Millers Point was demolished to make way for Hickson Road), this is a wonderful photo with amazing composition, curves and perspectives. How to make old 'slums' look beautiful . John Degotardi Jnr photographer?
